subject: fix: filter and compare updates now apply to Overview tab
body:
- Add getCurrentPeriodCommits() helper for dynamic filtered+period data
- Use initialization flags to prevent duplicate click handlers
- Overview cards (Features, Bugs, Urgency, Planned) now use dynamic data
- Health cards (Security, Reactive, Weekend, After Hours) now use dynamic data

Fixes issue where filters and Compare dropdown didn't affect Overview tab.
